casebody.data:
Arthur F. KNIGHT, Benjamin B. Hull, and the Horton Manufacturing Co., Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. UNION HARDWARE COMPANY, Defendant-Appellee. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. October 21, 1929. No. 22. Melville Church and C. B. Des Jardins, both of Washington, D. C., and William J. Malone, of Bristol, Conn., for appellants. Robert S. Allyn, of New York City (H3Tland R. Johns, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree [27 F.(2d) 946] affirmed.
